_comment: Example configuration for the self-review hook

self-review._comment_timeout: Maximum time in milliseconds for the hook to run
self-review._comment_patterns: Glob patterns for files to monitor. Empty array or omit to monitor all code files

focusAreas.name: Refactoring & Integration
questions: Did you just add code on top without integrating it properly?
Should you extract the new functionality into cleaner abstractions?
Would refactoring the surrounding code make everything simpler?

focusAreas.name: Code Quality
questions: Did you leave the code better than you found it?
Is there duplicated logic that should be extracted?
Are you using different patterns than the existing code uses?

focusAreas.name: Test Coverage
questions: Did you add tests for your new functionality?
Are the critical paths covered by tests?
Would another developer trust this code based on its tests?
